actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for States and local public utility taxes.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for State and local public utility taxes. Defines "public utility taxes" as taxes imposed on the furnishing or sale of electrical energy, water, sewage or disposal services, gas, or telephone services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for States and local public utility taxes.
